mean_cn: vt. 伪装，掩饰，假扮；  n. 伪装物，伪装，托辞，伪装的方式
mean_en: to change the usual appearance, sound, taste, etc. of somebody or something so that people will not recognize that person or thing
word_etyma: dis相反 + guise 方式 → 与现在的表现方式相反 → disguise 掩饰
short_phrase: wear a mask to disguise herself
sentence: Miss Bear disguised herself as a panda by wearing black stockings.
sentence_trans: 熊小姐通过穿黑丝袜把自己伪装成了一个熊猫。
